Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.command

Class DoneCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.command.DoneCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command
    public class DoneCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
    This command change the player state from currentState to nextState

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private PlayerState currentState
      This is the current state of the player
      private boolean endTurn
      This is true if the command end the turn
      private PlayerState nextState
      This is the future state of the player
      private Player player
      This is the player doing the command
      private boolean undoable
      This is true if the command is undoable

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DoneCommand​(Player player, ManageTurnState currentState)
      This constructor create a command that change the player state from ManageTurnState to IdleState
      DoneCommand​(Player player, ReadyToShootState currentState)
      This constructor create a command that change the player state from ReadyToShootState to ManageTurnState
      DoneCommand​(Player player, ScopeState currentState)
      This constructor create a command that change the player state from ScopeState to ReadyToShootState if the player can shoot again or do an extra move, otherwise change the state to ManageTurnState
      DoneCommand​(Player player, ShootedState currentState)
      This constructor create a command that change the player state from ShootedState to IdleState

      Create the command message that describes this command

      This method execute the command

      Gets if it is possible to undo the command

      This method undo the command
